name: Runaleit
description:
Find your fellow Aurora to return to the night sky, but make sure to avoid the dark zones. You must move quick, and intelligently, or else you may lose all of your light energy to the darkness.

Runaleit is a 1st person demo, using a low poly height map of the area around Hvalfjarðarsveit in Iceland. 

Your light bar will decrease when you are out of range of torches/aurora, the decrease of your light meter will be multiplied x3 if you find yourself in the dark (myrkur) zones around the islands. There are also 20 runes scattered around the Runaleit Isles to be found.

(Currently there is not a pause menu in the current build, feel free to request this and anything you may feel would improve the concept!)
